additionalMetadata.operatorDescription: Join two tables based on the character distance of two attributes

propertyDescription.innerAttribute: Attribute that is used to join 2 tables. Thejoin results will contain only the pairs that found matches based on the inner attribute on 2 different tables
propertyDescription.outerAttribute: Attribute that is used to join 2 tables. Thejoin results will contain the pairs that matched and the table entities that do not found match from another table
